abilities: {{Ability List|{{Ability|Lemon Juice of Doom|makes you drunk|drunk}}}}
sounds: YOU DARE TO HUNT ME? INFIDELS!
FEEL THE POWER OF THE ALLMIGHTY SCHNITZEL!
COME HERE AND TASTE MY LEMON JUICE OF DOOM!
name: The Great Schnitzel
behaviour: It does not move and cannot be pushed.
location: [[Orcsoberfest Island]]. Reach its hideout by entering an {{Ilink|Omnious Cauldron}} [[Omnious Cauldron]], whose locations are listed [[Orcsoberfest/Spoiler#The Great Schnitzel Hunt|here]]. Use {{Ilink|All Knowing Sausages}} [[All Knowing Sausages]] to find out which location is currently active.
strategy: Do not attack him, doing so will cause [[Drunkenness]]. Kill the {{Ilink|Spawn of the Schnitzel}} [[Spawn of the Schnitzel]] and use the {{Ilink|Schnitzel Meat Grinder}} [[Schnitzel Meat Grinder]] on it to hurt it 250 hp.
